verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:36
verses.text: The Lord shall bring thee, and thy king which thou shalt set over thee, unto a nation which neither thou nor thy fathers have known; and there shalt thou serve other gods, wood and stone.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:37
verses.text: And thou shalt become an astonishment, a proverb, and a byword, among all nations whither the Lord shall lead thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:38
verses.text: Thou shalt carry much seed out into the field, and shalt gather but little in; for the locust shall consume it.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:39
verses.text: Thou shalt plant vineyards, and dress them, but shalt neither drink of the wine, nor gather the grapes; for the worms shall eat them.
